✅ Next Steps

Thank you for booking your child’s place at Camp Adventure! We’re thrilled to welcome them to an unforgettable summer in the heart of the Ardennes.

Here’s what happens next:

  • 📬 Confirmation Email

    You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly with all your camp details, including dates, payment summary, and a digital copy of your welcome guide.

  • 🧳 Packing List

    A complete checklist will be sent 2 weeks before camp starts, with everything your child needs—from hiking shoes to silly costumes.

  • 🧾 Medical & Emergency Form

    Please complete the required forms before your child’s first day. You’ll find them linked in your email or through your parent dashboard.

  • 🕒 Stay Informed

    One week before camp, you’ll receive a reminder with drop-off and pick-up times, and details about our welcome desk.

Need to make changes? You can manage your booking anytime via your personal account.

🗺️ How to Get There

Camp Adventure – La Roche-en-Ardenne

Chemin des Fougères 17, 6980 La Roche, Belgium

📍 Tucked away in the lush forests near the Ourthe River, our camp is easily accessible by car or public transport.

  • 🚗 By Car:

    From Brussels, take the E411 towards Namur, then follow signs to Marche-en-Famenne and La Roche. Free parking is available on-site for drop-off and pickup days.

  • 🚉 By Train + Shuttle:

    Take a train to Marloie Station. From there, we offer a supervised shuttle service to camp for an extra fee. Don’t forget to book it in advance through your dashboard.

  • 🧭 Navigation Tip:

    Enter “Camp Sylva – Ardennes” into Google Maps or Waze. The entrance is marked by wooden signs and friendly faces!
